TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TicketCompatibilityMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義要使用 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 或當地時間做為表單驗證的票證到期日。

span.span: Defines whether to use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or local time for the ticket expiration date for forms authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用國際標準時間 (UTC) 或本地時間可以儲存 ASP.NET 表單驗證票證到期日。The ticket expiration date for ASP.NET forms authentication can be stored by using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or the local time. 應用程式之間的相容性和.NET Framework 的不同版本之間的相容性，可以藉由指定票證到期時間`ticketCompatilityMode`項目的屬性。For compatibility between applications, and for compatibility between different versions of the .NET Framework, the ticket expiration time can be specified by using the `ticketCompatilityMode` attribute of the element. 預設值為`ticketCompatibilityMode`屬性是 Framework20。The default value for the `ticketCompatibilityMode` attribute is Framework20. ## Examples 下列範例會將表單驗證票證到期日設定為 UTC 時間。The following example configures the forms authentication ticket expiration date as UTC time. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.TicketCompatibilityMode Framework20 = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定將票證到期日儲存為當地時間。

span.span: Specifies that the ticket expiration date is stored as local time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.TicketCompatibilityMode Framework40 = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定將票證到期日儲存為 UTC。

span.span: Specifies that the ticket expiration date is stored as UTC.
